mapper.update: CREATE TABLE admin ( user_id VARCHAR(10) PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR(30) UNIQUE, password VARCHAR(64), create_time DATETIME, last_login_time DATETIME );

CREATE TABLE user ( user_id VARCHAR(10) PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR(30) UNIQUE, password VARCHAR(64), create_time DATETIME, last_login_time DATETIME, account_status TINYINT(1), permissions VARCHAR(4) );

CREATE TABLE shareFile ( "code" VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL, "file_path" VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, "creator" VARCHAR(30) NOT NULL, "create_time" DATETIME NOT NULL, "status" TINYINT(1) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY ("code") );
